column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I decided to take a trip to Europe .
#text=First , I went online and found tickets to the destination , Bulgaria .
#text=Then , I purchased those online tickets with my credit card and printed out the receipt with my printer .
#text=I went into my bedroom and packed all of my bags .
#text=Once the taxi arrived , I put my bags into the trunk of the taxi and the taxi driver drove me to the airport .
#text=At the airport , I waited in the line for Delta flights to check in my bags .
#text=Once my bags were checked in , I got my boarding pass .
#text=Next , I went to the second floor of the airport terminal , where my carry on luggage was scanned and I was searched .
#text=Then , I went to my gate and saw the airplane waiting outside on the loading arm .
#text=After 20 minutes , the stewardess made an announcement that the airplane was boarding .
#text=I got on the flight , took my seat and the airplane took off .
#text=Then I flew in the plane for 5 hours .
